data.title: Marketing Material
data.description:
<style type="text/css">
              .course-info-widget .bottom
              {
              margin-top: 10px;
              width: 210px;
              }
              .course-info-widget .tutorial-links
              {
              list-style-type: none;
              color: #27327D;
              }
              .course-info-widget .tutorial-links li
              {
              border-bottom: dotted 1px #27327D;
              padding: 6px;
              }
              .course-info-widget .tutorial-links li.header-row
              {
              border-top: 4px solid #27327D;
              }
              .page-action-Unauthenticated .course-info-widget .tutorial-links li.header-row
              {
              border-top: 1px dotted #27327D;
              margin-top: 30px;
              }
              .course-info-widget .tutorial-links li.header-row h1
              {
              margin: 0;
              font-size: 12px;
              white-space: nowrap;
              }
              .marketing-content
              {
              width: 90%;
              margin: auto;
              }
              .marketing-content .bottom
              {
              font-size: 10px;
              font-weight: normal;
              margin-top: 20px;
              text-align: right;
              }
              .marketing-content .bottom span a
              {
              text-decoration: none;
              color: #27327D;
              }
              .marketing-content .tutorial-link
              {
              cursor: pointer;
              font-size: 12px;
              color: #1e5ac8;
              }
              .marketing-content ul
              {
              list-style-type: disc;
              line-height: 24px;
              margin-left: 15px;
              }
              .marketing-content ul li
              {
              color: #505050;
              }
              .marketing-content h1
              {
              font-size: 16px;
              color: #27327D;
              line-height: 30px;
              }
              body.product-type-ecom #main
              {
              background-image: none !important;
              background-position: 0 18px !important;
              background-repeat: repeat-x !important;
              min-width: 960px;
              overflow-x: auto;
              overflow-y: auto;
              top: 72px;
              padding-top: 32px;
              position: relative;
              float: none !important;
              margin-top: 0 !important;
              }
              .product-type-ecom #ecom-marketing h2
              {
              line-height: 24px;
              color: #e51937;
              font-size: 24px;
              font-family: TimesNewRoman, "Times New Roman" , Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif;
              font-style: italic;
              text-align: center;
              margin-bottom: 24px;
              }
              .product-type-ecom #ecom-marketing h2 span
              {
              font-style: normal;
              font-size: 24px;
              line-height: 24px;
              color: #e51937;
              font-size: 24px;
              font-family: TimesNewRoman, "Times New Roman" , Times, Baskerville, Georgia, serif;
              text-align: center;
              }
              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-branding-book-wrapper h2 {
              font-size: 14px;
              text-align: left;
              margin: 6px 0 0 0;
              }
              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-branding-book-wrapper h2 span
              {
              font-size: 14px;
              }

              .product-type-xbook #PX_HOME_ZONE_2, .product-type-xbook #main-container
              {
              height: 100%;
              }

              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-nav {
              float: left;
              width: 100%;
              height: 35px;
              margin: 0 0 12px 0;
              padding-right: 0;
              border: 1px solid #c9c8c8;
              background-color: #c9c8c8;
              -moz-border-radius-bottomright: 20px;
              -moz-border-radius-topright: 20px;
              -webkit-border-radius-topright: 20px;
              -webkit-border-radius-bottomright: 20px;
              border-top-right-radius: 20px;
              border-bottom-right-radius: 20px;
              -moz-box-shadow: 0 1px 0 #999, 0 1px 0 #e0e0e0 inset;
              -webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 0 #999, 0 1px 0 #e0e0e0 inset;
              box-shadow: 0 1px 0 #999, 0 1px 0 #e0e0e0 inset;
              }

              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-nav ul
              {
              margin: 0;
              padding: 0;
              width: 100%;
              }
              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-nav ul li
              {
              float: left;
              margin: 0;
              list-style: none;
              padding-right: 0;
              }
              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-nav ul li .icon
              {
              background-image: url("style/images/xbook-mars-nav-icon.png");
              background-repeat: no-repeat;
              width: 20px;
              height: 26px;
              display: block;
              float: right;
              background-position: 0 5px;
              margin-left: 12px;
              }

              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-nav ul li a {
              line-height: 36px;
              color: #333;
              text-transform: capitalize;
              font-family: Arial, "Helvetica" ,sans-serif;
              font-weight: normal;
              font-size: 13px;
              letter-spacing: 0;
              padding: 0 12px;
              }

              .xbook-mars-nav ul li a:hover span{
              color:#fff;
              }

              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-nav .pxicon.pxicon-right-open{
              color: #e51937;
              margin-right:0;
              }
              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content
              {
              float: left;
              width: 100%;
              text-align: left;
              padding-left: 98px;
              position: relative;
              }
              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content span {
              clear: both;
              float: left;
              width: 100%;
              }
              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content ul
              {
              font-size: 14px;
              list-style-type: disc;
              list-style-position: inside;
              padding-left: 14px;
              line-height: 24px;
              margin-bottom: 8px;
              }

              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content ul a,
              .xbook-mars-content a u  {
              color: #2A679F;
              text-decoration:none;
              }

              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content ul a:hover{
              text-decoration:underline;
              }
              .xbook-mars-content .bedford-media-prompt
              {
              padding: 12px;
              background-color: #eae9e9;
              border: 1px solid #ccc;
              white-space: normal;
              font-size: 14px;
              font-family: Arial, "Helvetica Neue" , Helvetica, sans-serif;
              }
              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content .bedford-media-prompt span
              {
              color: #e51937;
              }
              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content .content-wrapper
              {
              width: 460px;
              margin: 0 auto;
              position: relative;
              }
              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content .content-wrapper h1{
              font-family: Century Gothic, sans-serif;
              font-weight: bold;
              font-size: 25px;
              color: #4d4d4d;
              }
              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content .content-wrapper .subtitle
              {
              color: #E95A4E;
              display: block;
              font-family: Georgia,Times, "Times New Roman" ,serif;
              font-size: 22px;
              font-style: italic;
              line-height: 28px;
              padding: 8px 0 0 0;
              }
              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content .content-wrapper .author
              {
              clear: both;
              color: #333333 !important;
              display: block;
              font-family: Georgia,Times, "Times New Roman" ,serif;
              font-size: 16px !important;
              margin: 8px 0;
              }
              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content .content-wrapper p
              {
              font-size: 14px;
              line-height: 18px;
              font-family: Arial, "Helvetica Neue" ,Helvetica,sans-serif;
              margin-top: 12px;
              }
              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content .xbook-mars-branding
              {
              clear: both;
              width: 475px;
              height: 217px;
              background-repeat: no-repeat;
              margin: 0 auto;
              position: relative;
              top: -295px;
              left: -32px;
              display: none;
              }

              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content .xbook-mars-branding-book-wrapper {
              position: absolute;
              top: 38px;
              left: 0;
              }

              .bmi-book{
              background-image: url('http://qa.bedfordstmartins.com/brainhoney/resource/6650/Content/images/practical-argument-book2.png');
              background-repeat: no-repeat;
              height: 185px;
              position: relative;
              width: 150px;
              margin: 0;
              background-size: contain;
              float: left;
              }

              .book-title {
              color: #666;
              font-size: 13px;
              margin-top: 20px;
              clear: both;
              float: left;
              }

              .book-title h3{
              color: #e30c2b;
              font-size: 13px;
              font-family: "Lucida Grande", Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
              font-style: italic;
              font-weight: normal;
              }

              .book-title div{
              margin-top:12px;
              }

              .book-title span{
              line-height:16px;
              }

              .ecom-btns .icon
              {
              background-color: transparent;
              background-image: url("style/images/platx_sprite.png");
              background-position: -99px -353px;
              background-repeat: no-repeat;
              display: block;
              float: right;
              height: 12px;
              width: 18px;
              }



              #menu, #menu ul {
              margin: 0;
              padding: 0;
              list-style: none;
              }

              #menu {
              width: 668px;
              margin: 0px auto;
              border: 1px solid #c9c8c8;
              background-color: #c9c8c8;
              -moz-border-radius-bottomright: 20px;
              -moz-border-radius-topright: 20px;
              -webkit-border-radius-topright: 20px;
              -webkit-border-radius-bottomright: 20px;
              border-top-right-radius: 20px;
              border-bottom-right-radius: 20px;
              -moz-box-shadow: 0 1px 0 #999, 0 1px 0 #e0e0e0 inset;
              -webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 0 #999, 0 1px 0 #e0e0e0 inset;
              box-shadow: 0 1px 0 #999, 0 1px 0 #e0e0e0 inset;

              }

              #menu:before,
              #menu:after {
              content: "";
              display: table;
              }

              #menu:after {
              clear: both;
              }

              #menu {
              zoom:1;
              }

              #menu li {
              float: left;

              position: relative;
              }

              #menu a {
              float: left;
              padding: 10px 15px;
              color: #333333;
              font: 13px Arial, Helvetica;
              text-decoration: none;
              }

              #menu li:hover > a {
              color: #fff; text-decoration:none;
              }

              *html #menu li a:hover { /* IE6 only */
              color: #1291c7;text-decoration:none;
              }

              #menu ul {
              margin: 20px 0 0 0;
              _margin: 0; /*IE6 only*/
              opacity: 0;
              visibility: hidden;
              position: absolute;
              top: 38px;
              left: 0;
              z-index: 1;
              background: #c9c8c8;

              background: -moz-linear-gradient(#ebebeb, #c9c8c8);
              background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(#ebebeb), to(#c9c8c8));
              background: -webkit-linear-gradient(#ebebeb, #c9c8c8);
              background: -o-linear-gradient(#ebebeb, #c9c8c8);
              background: -ms-linear-gradient(#ebebeb, #c9c8c8);
              background: linear-gradient(#ebebeb, #c9c8c8);
              -moz-box-shadow: 0 -1px rgba(255,255,255,.3);
              -webkit-box-shadow: 0 -1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.3);
              box-shadow: 0 -1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.3);
              -moz-border-radius: 3px;
              -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
              border-radius: 3px;
              -webkit-transition: all .2s ease-in-out;
              -moz-transition: all .2s ease-in-out;
              -ms-transition: all .2s ease-in-out;
              -o-transition: all .2s ease-in-out;
              transition: all .2s ease-in-out;


              }


              #menu li:hover > ul {
              opacity: 1;
              visibility: visible;
              margin: 0;
              font-size:18px;


              }

              #menu ul ul {
              top: 0;
              left: 150px;
              margin: 0 0 0 20px;
              _margin: 0; /*IE6 only*/
              font-size:18px;

              }

              #menu ul li {
              float: none;
              display: block;
              border: 0; font-style:italic;
              _line-height: 0; /*IE6 only*/
              -moz-box-shadow: 0 1px 0 #111, 0 1px 0 #fff;
              -webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 0 #111, 0 1px 0 #fff;
              box-shadow: 0 1px 0 #111, 0 1px 0 #fff;
              font-size:18px;
              color:1291c7;
              }

              #menu ul li:last-child {
              -moz-box-shadow: none;
              -webkit-box-shadow: none;
              box-shadow: none;
              font-size:18px;
              }

              #menu ul a {
              padding: 10px;
              width: 200px;
              _height: 10px; /*IE6 only*/
              display: block;
              white-space: nowrap;
              float: none;
              text-transform: none;
              font-size:13px;
              line-height: 19px;
              }

              #menu ul a:hover {
              background-color: #0186ba;
              background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(#04acec,  #0186ba);
              background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(#04acec), to(#0186ba));
              background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(#04acec, #0186ba);
              background-image: -o-linear-gradient(#04acec, #0186ba);
              background-image: -ms-linear-gradient(#04acec, #0186ba);
              background-image: linear-gradient(#04acec, #0186ba);
              }

              #menu ul li:first-child > a {
              -moz-border-radius: 3px 3px 0 0;
              -webkit-border-radius: 3px 3px 0 0;
              border-radius: 3px 3px 0 0;
              }

              #menu ul li:first-child > a:after {
              content: '';
              position: absolute;
              left: 40px;
              top: -6px;
              border-left: 6px solid transparent;
              border-right: 6px solid transparent;
              border-bottom: 6px solid #444;
              }

              /* Mobile */
              #menu-trigger {
              display: none;
              }

              @media screen and (max-width: 600px)
              {

              /* nav-wrap */
              #menu-wrap
              {
              position: relative;
              }

              #menu-wrap *
              {
              -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
              -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
              box-sizing: border-box;
              }

              /* menu icon */
              #menu-trigger
              {
              display: block; /* show menu icon */
              height: 40px;
              line-height: 40px;
              cursor: pointer;
              padding: 0 0 0 35px;
              border: 1px solid #222;
              color: #fafafa;
              font-weight: bold;
              background-color: #111;
              -moz-border-radius: 6px;
              -webkit-border-radius: 6px;
              border-radius: 6px;
              -moz-box-shadow: 0 1px 1px #777, 0 1px 0 #666 inset;
              -webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 1px #777, 0 1px 0 #666 inset;
              box-shadow: 0 1px 1px #777, 0 1px 0 #666 inset;
              }

              /* main nav */
              #menu
              {
              margin: 0;
              padding: 10px;
              position: absolute;
              top: 40px;
              width: 100%;
              z-index: 1;
              background-color: #444;
              display: none;
              -moz-box-shadow: none;
              -webkit-box-shadow: none;
              box-shadow: none;
              font-size: 24px;
              }

              #menu:after
              {
              content: '';
              position: absolute;
              left: 25px;
              top: -8px;
              border-left: 8px solid transparent;
              border-right: 8px solid transparent;
              border-bottom: 8px solid #444;
              font-size: 24px;
              }

              #menu ul
              {
              position: static;
              visibility: visible;
              opacity: 1;
              margin: 0;
              background: none;
              -moz-box-shadow: none;
              -webkit-box-shadow: none;
              box-shadow: none;
              font-size: 24px;
              }

              #menu ul ul
              {
              margin: 0 0 0 20px !important;
              -moz-box-shadow: none;
              -webkit-box-shadow: none;
              box-shadow: none;
              font-size: 24px;
              }

              #menu li
              {
              position: static;
              display: block;
              float: none;
              border: 0;
              margin: 5px;
              -moz-box-shadow: none;
              -webkit-box-shadow: none;
              box-shadow: none;
              }

              #menu ul li
              {
              margin-left: 20px;
              -moz-box-shadow: none;
              -webkit-box-shadow: none;
              box-shadow: none;
              }

              #menu a
              {
              display: block;
              float: none;
              padding: 0;
              color: #999;
              }

              #menu a:hover
              {
              color: #fafafa;
              }

              #menu ul a
              {
              padding: 0;
              width: auto;
              }

              #menu ul a:hover
              {
              background: none;
              }

              #menu ul li:first-child a:after,
              #menu ul ul li:first-child a:after
              {
              border: 0;
              }
              }

              @media screen and (min-width: 600px) {
              #menu {
              display: block !important;
              }
              }

              /* iPad */
              .no-transition {
              -webkit-transition: none;
              -moz-transition: none;
              -ms-transition: none;
              -o-transition: none;
              transition: none;
              opacity: 1;
              visibility: visible;
              display: none;
              }

              #menu li:hover > .no-transition {
              display: block;
              }

              /* FONT STYLES*/
              h3{
              font-family:"Times New Roman", Times, serif;
              font-size:20px; font-style:normal; font-weight:100;
              color:#666;
              margin: 0 ;
              padding: 0;

              }

              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content h4{
              color: #696969;
              font-size: 13px;
              font-family: "Lucida Grande", Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
              font-weight: 100;
              line-height: 9px;
              }

              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content h4{
              color: #e30c2b;
              font-size: 13px;
              font-family: "Lucida Grande", Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
              font-weight: 100;
              line-height: 16px;
              }

              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content .content-wrapper .h4sub{
              color: #696969;
              font-size: 11px;
              font-style:italic;
              font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
              margin-top:2px;
              }

              .content-wrapper .h3sub {
              font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
              font-size: 14px;
              font-weight: 100;
              line-height: 14px;
              margin-bottom: 6px;
              }

              .content-wrapper .h3sub em{
              font-size: 18px;
              color: #e30c2b;
              }

              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content .content-wrapper p{
              color: #434343;
              font-size: 14px;
              font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
              text-align: left;
              }

              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content .content-wrapper .sub{
              color:#333;
              font-size: 14px;
              line-height:20px;
              font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
              text-align:left;
              margin:0px 20px 0px 20px;

              }

              #ecom-marketing .xbook-mars-content .content-wrapper ul{
              color: #434343;
              font-size: 14px;
              font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
              text-align: left;
              line-height: 20px;
              }

              /* END FONTS STYLES */

              #demobody {
              padding : 0;
              margin : 0;
              font : 100.1% 'lucida sans', 'lucida sans unicode', 'lucida grande', 'trebuchet ms', helvetica, arial, sans-serif;
              }

              #wrapper {
              width : 668px;
              background-color : #ffffff;
              margin : auto;
              }


              #content {
              float : right;
              display : inline;
              width : 475px;
              margin: 10px 0px 0px 0px;
              padding: 0px;
              }


              #sidebar {
              float : left;
              display : inline;
              width : 150px;
              padding-top: 10px;
              padding-right: 10px;
              padding-bottom: 0px;
              padding-left: 0px;
              }


              #share {
              width : 668px;
              height : auto;
              text-align : right;
              padding: 10px  0px 0px 0px;
              }

              #postit {
              width:470px;
              border:1px solid #CCC;
              background:#f3f4f6;
              border-radius:10px;
              box-shadow: 4px 4px 8px  #f1f1f1;
              padding:15px 0px 15px 0px;
              }

              </style>

              <div id="main-container" class="practicalargument">
              <div class="xbook-mars-nav">
              <ul class="tutorial-links">
              <li class="header-row"><a target="_blank" href="http://www.bedfordstmartins.com/Catalog/product/practicalargument-secondedition-kirszner">
              <span rel="">About the Book</span><span class="pxicon pxicon-right-open"></span></a></li><li><a target="_blank"
              href="http://www.bedfordstmartins.com/Catalog/product/practicalargument-secondedition-kirszner/formatsandpackages">
              <span rel="">Formats and e-Books</span><span class="pxicon pxicon-right-open"></span></a></li><li>
              <a target="_blank" href="http://bedfordstmartins.com/rewriting"><span rel="">Re:Writing</span><span
              class="pxicon pxicon-right-open"></span></a></li><li><a target="_blank" href="http://www.bedfordstmartins.com/Catalog/product/practicalargument-secondedition-kirszner/instructorresources">
              <span rel="">Instructor Resources</span><span class="pxicon pxicon-right-open"></span></a></li></ul>
              </div>
              <div class="xbook-mars-content">
              <div class="content-wrapper">
              <h1>
              Bedford Media <font style="font-family: Georgia, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
              font-size: 20px; font-weight: normal;">for</font></h1>
              <h3 class="h3sub">
              <em>Practical Argument</em>, Second Edition;<br>
              </h3>
              <br>
              <p>
              <strong>Students can</strong></p>
              <ul style="margin-top: 0px;">
              <li>log into the Integrated Media for their book
              <img src="http://dev.bedfordstmartins.com/brainhoney/resource/6650/Content/images/arrow3.png" width="13px" height="13px" style="margin-bottom: -1px;">
              </li>
              <li>purchase other <strong>Formats and e-Books</strong> </li>
              <li>use open resources in <strong><a target="_blank" href="http://bedfordstmartins.com/rewriting">
              Re:Writing</a></strong><br>
              <br>
              </li>
              </ul>
              <p>
              <strong>Instructors can</strong></p>
              <ul style="margin-top: 0px;">
              <li>log into the Integrated Media with instructor access
              <img src="http://dev.bedfordstmartins.com/brainhoney/resource/6650/Content/images/arrow3.png" width="13px" height="13px" style="margin-bottom: -1px;">
              </li>
              <li>request an exam copy from <strong>About the Book</strong> </li>
              <li>learn about other <strong>Formats and e-Books </strong></li>
              <li>download<strong> Instructor Resources</strong></li></ul>
              <br>
              <div id="postit">
              <p class="sub">
              <font style="color: #e30c2b">Bedford Integrated Media</font> take advantage of what
              the Web can do.
              <br>
              <br>
              Students receive access to Bedford Integrated Media with the purchase of a new print
              book or Bedford e-book. If the code does not work, it might be expired. Students
              may purchase access using the "Purchase Access" option on the right.
              <br>
